Our Success Stories

NeST Digital's CASBA Solution Modernizes Enterprise Financial Services for Kerala’s Largest Government Financial Services Provider, With $7 Billion AUM and 650 Branches Nationwide

NeST Digital provided a state-of-the-art enterprise financial system solution, CASBA (Core Application Software for Business Accounting), for the largest Government Financial Services Enterprise in Kerala, India. READ MORE

Utility Pole Capture from
LiDAR Point Cloud

Utility poles and towers are fundamental pieces of infrastructure used for power and telecom utilities across every country worldwide. A US-based utility company required details of utility poles and attachments... READ MORE

Revolutionizing EMR with AI-Powered Voice Integration: NeST Digital's Success Story with a Top Electronic Medical Record Software Provider in Canada

The client provides Electronic Medical Record (EMR) software solutions to healthcare practices in Canada. EMR systems are digital versions of patients’ healthcare charts that allow clinicians to create, store, and receive them... READ MORE

An IoT-based Data Monitoring System for Air Compressor

Preventive maintenance is crucial for an industrial air compressor to ensure the smooth functioning of the overall system and the associated machinery. To avoid unexpected downtime, it is essential to have a timely compressor... READ MORE

What our Customers say about us

“We appreciate the thoughtfulness at NeST’s side in this difficult situation for taking effective steps to ensure that the services go on, uninterrupted, by minimizing any impact of this pandemic.

We, sincerely hope that everybody recovers from the aftereffects of COVID-19 very soon. Let’s try to stay safe and help others as well, to do the same.”

CEO

Engineering Major based in USA

We are pleased to state that we have been successfully using FliSafe (Version 2.3) supplied by Aerospace Division of NeST Group (India) for Flight Data analysis since 1999. We use it for our fleet of ATR, 8737, A330/340 and 6777.

This product is of world standard and is supported by a team of efficient professionals. In Any reference from our side is welcome..”

Sr. GM
Air Safety, A domestic international airline major, based in Mumbai

Received prompt response and never felt any disruption in the Support/service at any time.

Project Director,
Major Bank in Middle East

Even if your team is at home/office, we are always receiving immediate response from your team and this is certainly praiseworthy

Engineering Director,
US based Industrial Client

The transition to the Covid-19 phase seemed to happen seamlessly. Ability to provide continued support as needed, during off hours and uncertain times, is really appreciated.

Vice President,
A multinational GIS client

We would like to thank NeST software team for the excellent collaboration and on time delivery on the S34 Project.

The software deliveries have been of good quality and has performed well on the installed systems in field (>100 installations in the field). We look forward to collaborating with NeST on other project topics in the future.

Senior General Manager – R&D, Tier 1 medical technology company headquartered in Germany
